DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: Microsoft , Visa to Develop Secure Electronic Payment System : The software giant and the credit_card purveyor said they will work together to develop a secure method for transmitting credit-card information between buyers and merchants.The effort could eventually make_it much easier for customers and merchants to conduct business over the Internet computer_network or other on-line computer services . The technology will be based on Microsoft ' s popular operating_system Windows and will be available in 1995 . It will include encryption capabilities -- which scramble sensitive information so that only the intended receiver can read it -- from RSA Data Security Inc. , a closely held Silicon_Valley company .
